trans-unit.source: Open the project file default.js and in the **app.OnActivated** method overload, replace the last call to the **refreshTodoItems** method with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Open the project file default.js and in the **app.OnActivated** method overload, replace the last call to the **refreshTodoItems** method with the following code:

trans-unit.source: This creates a member variable for storing the current user and a method to handle the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: This creates a member variable for storing the current user and a method to handle the authentication process.

trans-unit.source: The user is authenticated by using a Facebook login.
trans-unit.target: The user is authenticated by using a Facebook login.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an identity provider other than Facebook, change the value passed to the login method above to one of the following: _microsoftaccount_, _twitter_, _google_, or _windowsazureactivedirectory_.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an identity provider other than Facebook, change the value passed to the login method above to one of the following: _microsoftaccount_, _twitter_, _google_, or _windowsazureactivedirectory_.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]If you registered your Windows Store app package information with Mobile Services, you should call the login method by supplying a value of true for the useSingleSignOn parameter.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]If you registered your Windows Store app package information with Mobile Services, you should call the login method by supplying a value of true for the useSingleSignOn parameter.

trans-unit.source: If you do not do this, your users will still be presented with a login prompt every time that the login method is called.
trans-unit.target: If you do not do this, your users will still be presented with a login prompt every time that the login method is called.

trans-unit.source: Press the F5 key to run the app and sign into the app with your chosen identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Press the F5 key to run the app and sign into the app with your chosen identity provider.

trans-unit.source: When you are successfully logged-in, the app should run without errors, and you should be able to query Mobile Services and make updates to data.
trans-unit.target: When you are successfully logged-in, the app should run without errors, and you should be able to query Mobile Services and make updates to data.
